section.title: authentication_rpc_url (string)
section.para: RPC URL for the Oasis Sapphire network endpoint. Used for authentication contract calls via eth_call method.

section.title: authentication_contract_address (string)
section.para: Smart contract address on Oasis Sapphire that handles authentication. Must implement authenticateUser() and getWalletAddress() functions.

section.title: ens_rpc_url (string)
section.para: RPC URL for ENS queries. Enables multi-network authentication where ENS is on Ethereum while authentication contracts are on Oasis Sapphire. If not set, uses authentication_rpc_url for ENS queries.

section.title: ens_registry_address (string)
section.para: ENS Registry contract address. Standard address on Ethereum mainnet and testnets.

section.title: ens_name_wrapper_address (string)
section.para: ENS Name Wrapper contract address for wrapped domains. Different addresses on mainnet vs testnets.

section.title: contract_debug_mode (integer)
section.para: Enable debug logging for authentication and ENS operations. Warning: May log sensitive authentication data.

section.title: rpc_timeout (integer)
section.para: Timeout in seconds for RPC calls to blockchain networks. Includes both authentication and ENS queries.

section.title: Environment Variable Configuration
section.para: All parameters can be configured via environment variables for containerized deployments. Environment variables take precedence over modparam configurations.

example.title: Complete environment configuration
